title: A Whippoorwill in the Woods - implies the aunt

content.question: In line 34, the speaker implies that the aunt

choices.label: had lived most of her life fearing natural disaster
understood nature better than the speaker
preferred not to face certain realities about nature
was largely indifferent to her natural surroundings

content.answer: preferred not to face certain realities about nature

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
